Rules.InvariantScript:
If(
    Parent.Width > Parent.ScreenWidthBreakpoints.Large,
    ScreenSize.ExtraLarge,
    If(
        Parent.Width > Parent.ScreenWidthBreakpoints.Medium && Parent.Width <= Parent.ScreenWidthBreakpoints.Large,
        ScreenSize.Large,
        If(
            Parent.Width > Parent.ScreenWidthBreakpoints.Small && Parent.Width <= Parent.ScreenWidthBreakpoints.Medium,
            ScreenSize.Medium,
            If(
                Parent.Width <= Parent.ScreenWidthBreakpoints.Small,
                ScreenSize.Small
            )
        )
    )
)

If(cmp_GCThemeMenu.MenuFontSize > 0,
    cmp_GCThemeMenu.MenuFontSize,
    If(cmp_GCThemeMenu.ContentWidth,
        16 * Switch(Value(lblContentWidthSizing_GCM.Text),  
            ScreenSize.Small, 0.5,  
            ScreenSize.Medium, 0.65,
            ScreenSize.Large, 0.80,  
            1),
        16 * Switch(Value(lblScreenWidthSizing_GCM.Text),  
            ScreenSize.Small, 0.5,  
            ScreenSize.Medium, 0.65,
            ScreenSize.Large, 0.80,  
            1)
    )
)

//Len(Self.Text) * Self.Size
Sum(AddColumns(Split(Self.Text, ""), "Size", LookUp(cmp_GCThemeMenu.FontSizing, CharFont=Self.Font && CharWeight=Self.FontWeight && Char = Result).Size), Size) * Self.Size + Self.PaddingLeft + Self.PaddingRight

If(cmp_GCThemeMenu.ContentWidth,
    15 * Switch(Value(lblContentWidthSizing_GCM.Text),  
        ScreenSize.Small, 0.5,  
        ScreenSize.Medium, 0.75,
        ScreenSize.Large, 0.9,  
        1),
    15 * Switch(Value(lblScreenWidthSizing_GCM.Text),  
        ScreenSize.Small, 0.5,  
        ScreenSize.Medium, 0.75,
        ScreenSize.Large, 0.9,  
        1)
)

Sum(AddColumns(Split(lblLongestMenuItem_GCTM.Text, ""), "Size", LookUp(cmp_GCThemeMenu.FontSizing, CharFont=lblMenuItem_GCTM.Font && CharWeight=lblMenuItem_GCTM.FontWeight && Char = Result).Size), Size) * lblMenuItem_GCTM.Size + lblMenuItem_GCTM.PaddingLeft + lblMenuItem_GCTM.PaddingRight +
If(cmp_GCThemeMenu.ContentWidth, 
    60 * Switch(Value(lblContentWidthSizing_GCM.Text),  
        ScreenSize.Small, 0.5,  
        ScreenSize.Medium, 0.75,
        ScreenSize.Large, 0.9,  
        1),
    60 * Switch(Value(lblScreenWidthSizing_GCM.Text),  
        ScreenSize.Small, 0.5,  
        ScreenSize.Medium, 0.75,
        ScreenSize.Large, 0.9,  
        1)
)

If(cmp_GCThemeMenu.ContentWidth,
    Parent.Width/2 - Self.Width/2,
    (1 * Switch(Value(lblScreenWidthSizing_GCM.Text),  
        ScreenSize.Small, Parent.Width/2 - (Parent.Width * 0.95)/2,  
        ScreenSize.Medium, Parent.Width/2 - (Parent.Width * 0.93)/2,
        Large, Parent.Width/2 - (Parent.Width * 0.7)/2,
        Parent.Width/2 - (Parent.Width * 0.54)/2)
    )
)

If(
    cmp_GCThemeMenu.ContentWidth > Parent.ScreenWidthBreakpoints.Large,
    ScreenSize.ExtraLarge,
    If(
        cmp_GCThemeMenu.ContentWidth > Parent.ScreenWidthBreakpoints.Medium && cmp_GCThemeMenu.ContentWidth <= Parent.ScreenWidthBreakpoints.Large,
        ScreenSize.Large,
        If(
            cmp_GCThemeMenu.ContentWidth > Parent.ScreenWidthBreakpoints.Small && cmp_GCThemeMenu.ContentWidth <= Parent.ScreenWidthBreakpoints.Medium,
            ScreenSize.Medium,
            If(
                cmp_GCThemeMenu.ContentWidth <= Parent.ScreenWidthBreakpoints.Small,
                ScreenSize.Small
            )
        )
    )
)

Sum(AddColumns(Split(Self.Text, ""), "Size", LookUp(cmp_GCThemeMenu.FontSizing, CharFont=Self.Font && CharWeight=Self.FontWeight && Char = Result).Size), Size) * Self.Size + Self.PaddingLeft + Self.PaddingRight

If(cmp_GCThemeMenu.MenuFontSize > 0,
    cmp_GCThemeMenu.MenuFontSize,
    If(cmp_GCThemeMenu.ContentWidth,
        16 * Switch(Value(lblContentWidthSizing_GCM.Text),  
            ScreenSize.Small, 0.5,  
            ScreenSize.Medium, 0.65,
            ScreenSize.Large, 0.80,  
            1),
        16 * Switch(Value(lblScreenWidthSizing_GCM.Text),  
            ScreenSize.Small, 0.5,  
            ScreenSize.Medium, 0.65,
            ScreenSize.Large, 0.80,  
            1)
    )
)
